title: Looking for Jimmy Bannon Mayo N300
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Looking for Jimmy Bannon Mayo N300
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bob Bannon
Hello fellow Cardboardians,

I guess from an investment perspective I am fortunate that there is only 1 Namesake card out there for me.
 Jimmy and his brother Tom Bannon both played in the 1890's but only brother Jim's career was card worthy.
I have never seen one but would love to own 1 one day. If anybody has one they would be willing to part with I would love to hear from you.
Email me at biggies@aol.com

Thanks,  Bob Bannon

"The best thing I ever saw never really happened at all."
- Guy in line at a Portalet outside Superbowl in San Diego
